title: Lawmakers push new bill showing Democrats, GOP support fusion energy
snippet: "Establishing the Office of Fusion is a bipartisan priority to support advancements in fusion technology to lower Americans' electric bills and meet the evolving energy needs of our nation," Padilla said.
